name: Hopper Team
description:
This team loves hopping to cross the road!
Try this all new and unique endless adventure

NO UNDESIRED ADS!
Only watch ads when you want and get coins from ads!

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY:
Hopper Team is a endless runner type of game. But this team like to hop rather than running. Hopper Team is a hybrid of two classic games “Snake” and “Frogger”.
You have to cross the road and go on. Of course you have to watch your step, you know that story, it’s boring. But there is something new in this game! YOU WILL GET FOLLOWERS! You have to watch their steps too. More followers you have bigger scores you make! But not get afraid, this game is easy to learn with simple user friendly controls. Just swipe to direction you want to hop.

MAJOR FEATURES:
- Discover cute blocky-type voxel characters
- Remember, each character has it’s own unique followers
- Try awesome power ups:
* Magnet: Magnetize and get more coins
* Siren: Rule the traffic and MAKE CARS STOP and make way for the cute hopper!
* Rocket: When you get tired of hopping, try FLYING!
- Solve challenging mazes and find the way in time or get roasted in LAVA!
- Upgrade your powerups and even the chance of finding powerups
- WIN FREE PRIZES in the prize roulette in every few hours
- DOUBLE YOUR COINS by wathcing ads
